ground_truth.question: What is the farthest you can go in the south?

questions: What is the extremity of south?
Which place marks the farthest south?
Where is the maximum South you can travel to on Earth?
What is the extreme South on Earth?
What is the furthest point in the south?
What location is most to the south?
What is the southernmost point you can visit?
If you keep traveling south, where will you end up?
What does the south end with?
answers: Most southern point - The South Pole
The extremity of Earth's South - The South Pole
context: thumb|250px|right|Points of the compass with south highlighted South is one of the 4 cardinal directions on a compass. South is normally down on the bottom of most maps. For example: Angola is to the south of Nigeria, which is itself to the south of Morocco . The South Pole is the farthest south you can go. Category:Basic English 850 words Category:Compass directions
